TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GapWidth extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Drawing.Charts.GapAmountType

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 and above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is c:gapWidth.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **gapWidth (Gap Width)** This element specifies the space between bar or column clusters, as a percentage of the bar or column width. |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |bar3DChart (§21.2.2.15); barChart (§21.2.2.16); ofPieChart (§21.2.2.126); upDownBars (§21.2.2.218)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |val (Gap Size Value)|Specifies that the contents of this attribute contain a gap amount between 0 and 500.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the *ST_GapAmount* simple type (§21.2.3.16).| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_GapAmount) is located in §A.5.1. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the GapWidth class.
